faqdescription: Everything you need to know to get started. Can’t find the answer you’re looking for? Join our <1>Telegram</1> to chat with our friendly team and get live support.
Trading on Layer-2 has never been easier.
Launch your app by clicking “Start Tradi: Launch your app by clicking “Start Trading” and connect your wallet.
Migrate funds over via the ZigZag bridge: Migrate funds over via the ZigZag bridge.
Zigzag is a native, easy-to-use, reliabl: ZigZag is a decentralised P2P order book exchange that uses ZK-Rollups for optimal security and scalability.
We offer extremely low slippage for trad: We offer extremely low slippage for trades of all sizes, quotes that compete with ones offered by centralized exchanges
By using ZK Rollups we are able to offer: By using ZK Rollups we are able to offer near-zero swap fees with nearly instantaneous transactions.
ZigZag aims to be fully decentralized an: ZigZag aims to be fully decentralized and open source.
All price feeds are fetched from central: All price feeds are fetched from centralized exchanges,  always guaranteeing the best price possible.
zigzag is a decentralized:
ZigZag is a decentralised, P2P, non-custodial exchange that uses ZK-Rollups to power its order book. With this innovative protocol, users can trade quickly and securely with extremely low fees. Plus, they will benefit from price quotes on par with centralised exchanges for all-size trades! 
 ZigZag strives to create a decentralised exchange that replicates the user experience from existing centralised exchanges, while also benefiting from a non-custodial aspect with optimal liquidity.
zk-rollups are one of the options:
The order book DEX is designed to mimic the user experience of a centralised exchange, which will be familiar and easy to use for traders who are used to that type of platform. 
 Users can trade directly from their wallets with no need to deposit or withdraw funds while remaining in full control of their assets. 
 The price quotes available on ZigZag are the most competitive available on-chain as market makers extract price feeds from centralised exchanges and relay them to ZigZag's order books.
What is zkSync?: How can I start using ZigZag?
zksync is a trustless protocol: To start, simply click “Start Trading” at the top of the page, and connect your Web3-wallet to the application. For zkSync 1.0 you will need to bridge funds from Ethereum activate your account with a one-time transaction, of roughly $0.50. Read the full guide!
How can I start using ZigZag?: What's the difference between zkSync 1.0 and 2.0?
To start using zigzag:
ZigZag Exchange is the first decentralised exchange built on an open ZK-Rollup chain (zkSync 1.0). 
 ZigZag is the first example of successful mass adoption on a ZK-Rollup which has led to its well-known name and reputation. 
 Since zkSync 1.0 is not zkEVM, the infrastructure is limited. With zkSync 2.0 (zkEVM), 
 ZigZag will provide users with additional features and benefits, such as <1>liquidity pools</1>. 
 A preview of ZigZag's zkSync 2.0 DEX is currently live on Arbitrum mainnet. Read more about <2>ZigZag’s move to zkSync 2.0.</2>
A decentralized order book exchange powe: A decentralised P2P order book exchange powered by Zero-Knowledge Technology.
We are always open to potential partners: We are always open to potential partnerships and are on the lookout for talented developers, designers and crypto marketing geniuses. If you would like to get in touch with us, please do so using the form below.
